quote: Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment. – Celestine Chua
fact: Van Gogh only sold one painting when he was alive.
joke: A man got hit in the head with a can of Coke, but he was alright because it was a soft drink.
